titleStmt.title: A few words in love to all those bishops, priests & magistrates, and others, who have had a hand in persecuting the innocent, (and yet looked to be excused, because, as they think, they have law for what they do) for them to vveigh and consider in the fear of God, and then see how far they will stand justified in his sight.
titleStmt.author: Willsford, John.

titleStmt.title: A few words in love to all those bishops, priests & magistrates, and others, who have had a hand in persecuting the innocent, (and yet looked to be excused, because, as they think, they have law for what they do) for them to vveigh and consider in the fear of God, and then see how far they will stand justified in his sight.
titleStmt.author: Willsford, John.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: The 22d of the 3d month, 1680. John Willsford.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
